data.title: Accel Technology Group
data.meta_description: Learn About Accel Technology Group, Your Trusted IT Support and Managed Service Provider in Oklahoma. Explore Our Dedication to Exceptional Managed IT Services.
data.text:
Since 2008, ACCEL Technology Group (ATG) has been dedicated to providing independent IT-managed service solutions from our base in Edmond, Oklahoma. Our journey began in 1997 as ACCI, specializing in industrial automation, process control CAD/CAM & ERP systems. Over time, we expanded into various industries, including hospitality/property management, recruiting/staffing services, physical therapy, and teleradiology. In 2008, we rebranded as ATG, introducing a new concept.

Led by Charley Moon since 2014, Accel Technology Group (ATG) is a trusted IT support and managed service provider in Oklahoma, specializing in delivering top-notch Cybersecurity Solutions and Managed IT Services. We've built a reputation for reliable and results-driven performance, emphasizing meticulous project planning and implementation for a seamless customer experience.

ATG, Your Trusted Managed IT Services Partner in Oklahoma. We excel in IT Support, Cybersecurity Solutions, and more, offering world-class expertise for businesses of all sizes. Whether it's supporting critical infrastructures or assisting with technology selection, our customers rely on us for long-term support and guidance in the ever-evolving business landscape.
